Fn::Sub:
{
    "widgets": [
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 6,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "mem_available", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "yAxis": "right", "color": "#2ca02c" } ],
                    [ ".", "mem_used", ".", ".", { "color": "#d62728" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "title": "RAM",
                "region": "${region}",
                "stat": "Average",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 0,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/EC2", "CPUUtilization", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}" ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "${region}",
                "title": "CPU",
                "period": 300,
                "stat": "Average"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 9,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/EC2", "NetworkIn", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}" ],
                    [ ".", "NetworkOut", ".", "." ]
                ],
                "region": "${region}",
                "title": "Network"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 3,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/EC2", "CPUCreditBalance", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "yAxis": "right" } ],
                    [ ".", "CPUSurplusCreditsCharged", ".", "." ],
                    [ ".", "CPUCreditUsage", ".", "." ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "${region}",
                "stat": "Average",
                "period": 300,
                "title": "CPU Credit Balance"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 12,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "disk_used_percent", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}" ]
                ],
                "region": "${region}",
                "title": "Percent of Disk Used"
            }
        }
    ]
}
